ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So remind them! You are only a reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Remind them; you are surely a reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So render good counsel, for you are simply required to counsel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), preach; you are only a preacher.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore advise; indeed you are a proclaimer of advice. (The Holy Prophet is a Remembrance from Allah.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So remind them -- you are only one who reminds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore do remind, for you are only a reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then remind them! Thou art only a reminder;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Remind them, for thou art but a remembrancer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So, [O Prophet] exhort them: your task is only to exhort,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Admonish thou then; thou art but an admonisher.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So admonish—for you are only an admonisher,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore do thou give admonition, for thou art one to admonish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So remind them (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)), you are only a one who reminds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore remind, you are only a Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So remind. You are only a reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:21] So remind, them of God’s graces and the proofs affirming His Oneness. For you are only an admonisher;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Remind them) admonish them, (for thou art but a remembrancer) you are but a warner by means of the Qur'an; it is also said that this means: you are only an admonisher by the Qur'an and through Allah,
